messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?

upgrade.title: Upgrade to Boutique
upgrade.description: Unlock powerful features for your tailoring business!
upgrade.modal_description: You're about to upgrade your account to a Boutique/Tailor-Shop account. This upgrade is completely free!
upgrade.info_message: Your existing measurements will be preserved. You can start adding customers right away!
upgrade.success: Congratulations! Your account has been upgraded to Boutique. You can now manage customers and access exclusive features!

customer.no_customers_msg: Visit Pattern Studio to add measurements for your first customer.
customer.no_measurements_recorded: No measurements recorded for this customer yet.

patterns.no_custom_patterns_desc: Custom pattern designs will appear here once added.
patterns.no_predesigned_patterns_desc: Pre-designed patterns will appear here once added by pattern providers.
patterns.no_front_designs_desc: Front blouse design options will appear here once added.
patterns.no_back_designs_desc: Back blouse design options will appear here once added.

modal.add_measurements_preview: Add your measurements to preview pattern
modal.select_customer_preview: Select a customer to preview pattern

toast.add_measurements_first: Please add your measurements first before generating a pattern
toast.select_customer_first: Please select a customer before generating a pattern

steps_guide.title: Steps to download the Pattern:
steps_guide.step1: Select Customer from Left column (if your customer is not available, click on 'New Customer').
steps_guide.step2: Once you select the customer / Added New customer, Select the Pattern Style. It will take you to next steps.

pattern_preview.pattern_not_available: The requested pattern type "{type}" is not available.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.intro: Please read this disclaimer before proceeding with your download:
disclaimer.warning: The pattern templates generated based on predefined measurements, it may or may not match your customer requirements. PLEASE DOUBLE CHECK THE PATTERN WITH YOUR / CUSTOMER MEASUREMENTS.
disclaimer.check_2: Verify the printed measurements match your requirements
disclaimer.check_3: Make a test cut on scrap fabric if needed
disclaimer.check_4: Make sure the selected paper size is available on the printer
disclaimer.check_5: All measurements are in Inches, so do the calculation accordingly
disclaimer.proceed_btn: I Agree and Proceed to Download

pattern_download.click_to_download_pdf: Click the button below to download your pattern PDF
pattern_download.click_to_download_svg: Click the button below to download your pattern SVG files
pattern_download.click_to_download_projector: Click the button below to download your Projector PDF
pattern_download.click_to_download_projector_png: Click the button below to download your Projector PNG files
pattern_download.click_to_download_measurement_guide: Click the button below to download your Pattern Measurement Guide PDF
pattern_download.no_measurements: No measurements found for this customer. Please add measurements first.

paper_size.label: Select Paper Size
paper_size.error_msg: Please select a paper size before downloading
paper_size.desc_a0: 33.1 × 46.8 in - Full pattern on single large sheet
paper_size.desc_a2: 16.5 × 23.4 in - Full pattern on single sheet
paper_size.desc_a4: 8.3 × 11.7 in - Pattern tiled across multiple pages
paper_size.desc_letter: 8.5 × 11 in - Pattern tiled across multiple pages
paper_size.desc_legal: 8.5 × 14 in - Pattern tiled across multiple pages
paper_size.desc_tabloid: 11 × 17 in - Full pattern on single sheet

svg_format.title: Format: SVG Vector Files (ZIP)
svg_format.description: 4 scalable vector files (Front, Back, Sleeve, Patti) bundled in a ZIP archive.
svg_format.note: These files can be edited in design software like Adobe Illustrator or Inkscape.

projector_pdf.title: Format: Projector PDF (Individual Files)
projector_pdf.description: Custom-sized pages for projector-based pattern cutting. Download each piece separately.
projector_pdf.note: Start with the calibration box to set your projector scale.
projector_pdf.info: Each pattern piece downloads as a separate PDF file - no unzipping required! Start with the Scale Calibration to adjust your projector before cutting.

projector_png.title: Format: Projector PNG (Individual Files)
projector_png.description: High-resolution PNG images for projector-based pattern cutting. Download each piece separately.
projector_png.note: Start with the calibration box to set your projector scale.
projector_png.info: Each pattern piece downloads as a separate PNG file at 150 DPI. Start with the Scale Calibration to adjust your projector before cutting.

measurement_guide.title: Format: Pattern Measurement Guide (A4 PDF)
measurement_guide.description: 3-page PDF with annotated pattern pieces showing all dimensions and measurements.
measurement_guide.note: Includes Front, Back, and Sleeve patterns with engineering-style dimension lines.
measurement_guide.info: This guide helps you understand and verify all pattern measurements before cutting. Print on A4 paper for best results.

tiled_printing.title: Tiled Printing:
tiled_printing.description: This pattern will be split across multiple pages with 5cm overlap areas. Print at 100% scale, then cut and tape the pages together using the alignment marks.

footer.message: Your pattern has been customized based on the customer's measurements.
footer.print_scale: Print at 100% scale for accurate sizing.

modal.pdf_downloading: Your pattern PDF is being downloaded to your device.
modal.step1_desc: The file should appear in your browser's default download location (usually ~/Downloads)
modal.step2_desc: Do not scale to fit page - this will change the pattern measurements
modal.step3_desc: Use the 2" × 2" test box on the pattern to confirm accurate printing

projector_modal.title: Projector Pattern Files
projector_modal.subtitle: Download each pattern piece individually - no unzipping needed!
projector_modal.tip: Download the Scale Calibration first and use the 10" × 10" box to adjust your projector before cutting patterns.

projector_png_modal.title: Projector PNG Files
projector_png_modal.subtitle: Download each pattern piece as a high-resolution PNG image

footer.tagline: CUSTOMIZED PATTERN DESIGNING FOR MEN & WOMEN & MANUFACTURING

print_instructions.title: Printing Instructions
print_instructions.step2: Do not scale to fit page

projector.adjust_projector: Adjust your projector until this box measures exactly 10" x 10"
projector.tip: Tip: Download the Scale Calibration first

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.pattern_accuracy: Pattern accuracy depends on correct measurements
disclaimer.agree_terms: By continuing, you agree to our terms

errors.connection_error: Connection error. Please check your internet.

home.hero_description: Exquisite made-to-measure pattern making services for the discerning woman. Every stitch tells a story of precision, every seam celebrates individuality.
home.hero_quote: Every garment is a canvas for your unique story
home.callout_designer: Are you a Pattern Designer? Start earning from your designs →
home.callout_wholesaler: Are you a Wholesaler or Garment Manufacturer? Showcase your catalog with us →
home.service1_desc: Choose from custom patterns tailored to your unique designs or select from our pre-designed patterns—both crafted precisely to your measurements for a perfect fit.
home.service2_desc: A dedicated marketplace for wholesalers and garment manufacturers to showcase their products. Connect directly with retailers and boutiques looking for quality bulk orders.
home.service3_desc: Custom-fitted garments crafted to your exact measurements and preferences. From elegant evening wear to professional attire, each piece is a testament to precision craftsmanship.
home.why_description: With over 40 years of combined experience, our master tailors bring techniques and attention to detail to every creation. We source the finest patterns globally and maintain the highest standards of craftsmanship.
home.why_feature1_desc: One-on-one consultations to understand your style, preferences, and lifestyle
home.why_feature2_desc: Multiple fittings and adjustments until you're completely satisfied
home.why_feature3_desc: Traditional methods passed down through generations of master tailors
home.modal_designer_subtitle: Join our community of talented pattern designers
home.modal_benefit1_desc: Access our growing community of tailors and fashion enthusiasts looking for quality patterns
home.modal_benefit2_desc: Upload once, earn repeatedly. Set your own prices and receive payments directly
home.modal_benefit3_desc: Your patterns are securely hosted with watermark protection and download tracking
home.modal_benefit4_desc: Track your sales, views, and customer feedback to grow your pattern business
home.modal_wholesaler_subtitle: Join our marketplace as a wholesaler or garment manufacturer
home.modal_wbenefit1_desc: Get your catalog in front of retailers, boutiques, and fashion businesses actively looking for suppliers
home.modal_wbenefit2_desc: Connect directly with potential buyers without intermediaries, building lasting business relationships
home.modal_wbenefit3_desc: Present your collections with stunning catalog pages, multiple variants, and detailed specifications
home.modal_wbenefit4_desc: Expand your reach beyond local markets and tap into a wider network of fashion industry buyers
home.how_to_use_description: Get your custom-fitted pattern in just four easy steps. From entering measurements to cutting your fabric perfectly.
home.step1_desc: Enter the measurements in the Pattern-Studio form
home.step2_desc: Register / Login to download the Pattern
home.step3_desc: Print on paper or use Projector to project and trace the Pattern
home.step4_desc: Measure the Pattern twice and make edits if required, then cut the Cloth

pattern_studio.description: Enter body measurements to receive custom-fitted patterns designed specifically for you
pattern_studio.enter_measurements_title: Enter measurements for the selected Blouse
pattern_studio.see_image_reference: For measurement location references, see image on left

blog.no_posts_desc: Check back soon for new articles and guides.

blog.translation_not_available: This article is not yet available in your language. Showing English version.
